dump(ArrayList<T>) - Method in interface core.dc.CatchAlgorithm
Dump list of tokens into bytes and then we can retrieve these tokens from load function NOTE: this function isn't used to dump tokens into original format compress and decompress function can use this function to dump bytes sequence if there dc info have token sequence
